Key Match Events: Ja Morant showed his intense athleticism with a 360-degree mid-air spin vs Nets
Morant pulled off another 360-degree shot later in the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies ended up losing 106-104 as the Nets pulled off a close win
Ja Morant has remained healthy and is back to putting up consistent numbers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Memphis Grizzlies' close loss pushes them to 4-4 and 10th in the standings
Ja Morant has been on a tear this season averaging 20.0 points, 5.2 rebounds, and 9.8 assists on 45.3% shooting
Others: The onus will once again be on Morant to deliver with the Lakers struggling on defense so far this season
